sys_hub_flow.description:
The flow shows an implementation of Box actions for moving files from ServiceNow to Box.

Trigger: The flow is triggered every time a record is created in the attachment table.

Flow Steps:

  1. Look Up Incident Record: The step retrieves the incident record which has the associated attachment.
  2. Move Attachment to Box: The step triggers a sub-flow which contains the steps and associated actions to move a file to box.
  3. Attachment Copied to Box Successfully: If the file is uploaded successfully then attachment is deleted from ServiceNow.
  4. Incidents are created in case a failure occurs during execution of any steps.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
